properties.areaDesc: Oak Point to Saxon Harbor WI
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 10 at 4:01PM CST until January 12 at 4:00PM CST by NWS Duluth MN
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Heavy Freezing Spray Warning, heavy freezing
spray at a rate of 2 cm per hour or greater expected, and may
rapidly accumulate on vessels. For the Small Craft Advisory,
northeast winds 15 to 25 knots with gusts up to 30 knots and
waves 6 to 9 feet expected.

* WHERE...Oak Point to Saxon Harbor WI.

* WHEN...From 4 AM Saturday to 4 PM CST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Operating a vessel in heavy freezing spray is
hazardous. Freezing spray may render mechanical and electronic
components inoperative. Rapid ice accretion on decks and
superstructures may result in a catastrophic loss of stability.
Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should prepare for dangerous accumulation of ice on
their vessel. If possible, remain in port, avoid the warning area
or conduct mitigation.

Anyone operating a smaller vessel should avoid navigating in
hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: HEAVY FREEZING SPRAY WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM SATURDAY TO 4 PM CST SUNDAY... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM SATURDAY TO 4 PM CST SUNDAY
